text: Jo [a'molas] hamcun torikihoe dar darjoi ƶarf ast, ki mavce onro mepusonad va ʙar farozi on mavce digar ast, [va] ʙar farozas aʙre [torik] qaror dorad. Torikihoe ast, jake ʙar farozi digare [cunon ki] agar [saxsi gumgasta] dasti xudro ʙerun ovarad, mumkin nest onro ʙuʙinad. Va kase, ki Alloh taolo nure [az hidojat] ʙarojas qaror nadoda ʙosad, pas, [hec hidojat va] nure ʙarojas nest
